document_data.name: Sorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Sorn''' was a fighter in [[Thay]] and an agent of the [[zulkir]] [[Lauzoril]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1357 DR, under Lauzoril's orders, Sorn posed as a trader and went to participate in the tournament held in [[Mourktar]] in [[Threskel]] to choose a new king. He managed to finish among the tournament's finalists. His orders were to win or kill the winner.
